metadata.title: CVE-2021-28166 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Eclipse Mosquitto version 2.0.0 to 2.0.9, if an authenticated clientthat had connected with MQTT v5 sent a crafted CONNACK message to thebroker, a NULL pointer dereference would occur.

criterions.comment: mosquitto: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
